ygData.msgSnippet: Starscream Strascream looked at Bluedron(spelling?) with a look of fear. Phobia s the only one still in here, and he s trapped in the fire around the bridge.

Starscream

Strascream looked at Bluedron(spelling?) with a look of fear.

"Phobia's the only one still in here, and he's trapped in the fire 
around the bridge. Plus there's less than a minute before the ship 
hits ground, and when she does she'll make a huge boom. Go tell 
everyone to get out of the way, I don't know how big this blast is 
gonna be. I'm going in."

Starscream entered the inferno. He stumbled blinding, trying to 
remember the way to the bridge. He found it, and could barely make 
out the form of Phobia. He grabbed him.

"Come on! We've got to get out of here!"

He starter walking towards the exit, with Phobia in his arms, and 
only seconds until the ship crashes.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix

Brix buried Gekkidama in some wreckage, said a prayer to the Matirx, 
and than came back to answer Ramulus' question.

"Internal Repairs? That can't fix a blown off arm. He needs mage 
repairs. They might be able to slow down the mech fluid leak, but 
eventually he'll join The Matrix if we don't do something fast. And I 
refuse to use the hull we got unless it's the last result. The plate 
did most of it, but youi're right, we'll still burn up. But if we 
saty here, we'll probably end up like Gekkidama and kill each other. 
Have any ideas?"
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron was confused about what the alliance was doing, so he broke 
off from the pack and followed Zardus. When Zardus landed, a bot 
almost shot him. Things seem to be cool now, but Gotron got all his 
weapons up and pointed them down at the bot. If this bot decided to 
attack Zardus, he was gonna get a two on one*.



*Unles Desmonus is there too, than it's 3 on 1.
